---
name: example-summarizer
description: A skill for summarizing text into clear bullet points.
---

# Summarizer Skill

## When to Use
- When asked to summarize text
- When content is long and needs condensing

## Instructions

1. Identify the main topic
2. Extract 3-5 key points
3. Format as bullet points
4. Keep each point under 20 words

## Output Format

Summary of [topic]:
* [key point 1]
* [key point 2]
* [key point 3]
